classes.btn: dib pv2 ph5 ba br1 x-b--orange x-bg-orange hover-bg-white white x-hover-orange lh-copy tc f6 pointer
classes.btn-white: dib pv2 ph5 ba br1 x-b--blue bg-white x-hover-bg-lightblue x-blue hover-white lh-copy tc f6 pointer
classes.btn-l: dib pv2 ph5 ph6-ns ba br1 x-b--orange x-bg-orange hover-bg-white white x-hover-orange lh-copy tc f5 pointer
classes.btn-l-white: dib pv2 ph5 ph6-ns ba br1 x-b--blue bg-white x-hover-bg-lightblue x-blue hover-white lh-copy tc f5 pointer
classes.btn-s: dib pv1 ph4 ba br1 x-b--orange x-bg-orange hover-bg-white white x-hover-orange lh-copy tc f6 pointer
classes.btn-s-white: dib pv1 ph4 ba br1 x-b--blue bg-white x-hover-bg-lightblue x-blue hover-white lh-copy tc f6 pointer
classes.flash-alert: pa3 ba bw0 br1 x-bg-palered x-red
classes.flash-notice: pa3 ba bw0 br1 x-bg-aquablue white
classes.h1: mt5 mb1 f2 f1-ns fw7 x-tahoma
classes.h2: mt4 mb1 f3 f2-ns fw7 x-tahoma x-orange
classes.h3: mt3 mb1 f4 f3-ns fw7 x-tahoma
classes.h4: mt2 mb1 f5 f4-ns fw7 x-tahoma
classes.headline: mt5 mb1 f2 f1-ns x-impact
classes.input-error-label: mt1 pa2 br1 bn x-bg-palered f6 lh-copy x-red
classes.input-text: input-reset w-100 pa2 ba br1 x-b--blue x-focus-b-orange x-on lh-copy
classes.input-text-narrow: input-reset db w-100 w5-ns pa2 ba br1 x-b--blue x-focus-b-orange x-on lh-copy
classes.label: db mb1 f6 x-lightblue
classes.select: input-reset w-100 pa2 ba br1 x-b--blue x-focus-b-orange x-on lh-copy pointer
classes.select-narrow: input-reset w-100 w5-ns pa2 ba br1 x-b--blue x-focus-b-orange x-on lh-copy pointer
classes.textarea: input-reset w-100 h4 pa2 ba br1 x-b--blue x-focus-b-orange x-on lh-copy
